metadata.title: CVE-2016-5699 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: CRLF injection vulnerability in the HTTPConnection.putheader function in urllib2 and urllib in CPython (aka Python) before 2.7.10 and 3.x before 3.4.4 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTTP headers via CRLF sequences in a URL.

criterions.comment: python2.7 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.10~rc1-1').
